techmeme.title: Raspberry Pi, a FTSE 250 company that defied the trend of UK-based tech companies that have listed in the US, has revived Cambridge's history of making hardware (John Gapper/Financial Times)

Google DeepMind is developing an AI research assistant for scientists; BioNTech's InstaDeep unveils a Llama 3.1-based AI assistant for experimental biology (Financial Times)
London-based Dexory, which builds autonomous robots for warehouses, raised a $80M Series B led by DTCP, taking its total equity funding to $120M (Kai Nicol-Schwarz/Sifted)
Resolve AI, which is building AI tools to help software engineers troubleshoot and fix production issues, raised a $35M seed led by Greylock (Krystal Hu/Reuters)
